about_the_game:
Orphan Taishi Zhao and his baby sister Xiang live in a small mountain village.
When their peaceful life is disrupted by a mysterious army and a shadowy figure,
Zhao must face fearsome monsters and triumph over powerful demons in order to protect Xiang.
Meanwhile, in the midst of this chaos, the truth about their parents' murder years ago is slowly being revealed.

In this demo, you will get to experience the beginning part of Zhao and Xiang's epic journey in Xuan-Yuan Sword VII.

※This Demo can’t be inherited to the Final Version
※This Demo may have few differences with the Final Version

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7,Windows 8, Windows 10 (64 bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 4590 or AMD equivalent (or better)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 960 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 50 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Direct compatible sound card for audio
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7,Windows 8, Windows 10 (64 bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 7700 or AMD equivalent (or better)
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA RTX2060 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 50 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Direct compatible sound card for audio

short_description: Xuan-Yuan Sword VII is an ARPG presented in a third-person perspective. The plot is rooted in Chinese history and mythology.
supported_languages:
English, Simplified Chinese*, Traditional Chinese*, German, Russian, Japanese, Spanish - Latin America, Korean
*languages with full audio support
